scripts.start: npm run build && node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon src/index.js --ignore test/
scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/**/*.js test/*.js
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly test/**/*.js test/*.js -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.vs:buildAndTest: npm run build && npm run vs:test
scripts.vs:test: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report cobertura --report lcov test/*.js test/**/*.js -- --timeout 5000 --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/test-results.xml
scripts.watch: npm run build -- -w | node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout 5000 --reporter min -w test/*.js test/**/*.js
